items.content_html: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.
items.title: smartlabsAT/react-resize-detector-context: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.

items.content_html: Daily Stoic PWA is a progressive web app (PWA) that delivers a daily Stoic quote to help users cultivate resilience, mindfulness, and wisdom. The app is lightweight, offline-friendly, and designed for quick, distraction-free inspiration.

items.content_html: Task Planner App is a simple web app to help users manage daily tasks. With a clean interface, users can add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. Ideal for personal, work, or study tasks, it’s built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a lightweight and accessible solution in any browser.
